product_name: Bodyglide For Her Anti-Chafing Skin Protectant - 0.8 oz
long_description: Bodyglide for Her(TM) anti-chafing skin protectant creates an invisible barrier on your skin to prevent blisters, chafing or any skin discomfort caused by friction. Compact size of Bodyglide for Her(TM) allows the stick to be taken along on any trip. All natural formula is fragrance-free, petroleum-free, hypoallergenic, water- and sweat-resistant, nongreasy and non-staining. Easily glides on like a solid deodorant so there's no mess or handwashing necessary after applying. Apply to bra line, thighs, neck, feet or any other place that rubs. Contains aloe vera and vitamin E to moisturize skin.
short_description: Bodyglide for Her(TM) anti-chafing skin protectant creates an invisible barrier on your skin to prevent blisters, chafing or any skin discomfort caused by friction.
